name: Linda
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! HeHe ! I'm Hope U are happy...
text2: I want you to know that I don’t have a single regret of our time together.You helped shape me to be who I am today and for that, I’ll always be grateful to you
text3: I wish you the best in life always, and your birthday is no exception. May you get everything you’ve ever wished for in life.I’ll always be grateful to know you in my life, as it’s better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Hmm, i'm just hope u happy .
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
